cause.description:
Fed up with it always raining? Always miss the train on Picadilly line? Constantly being offered flyers? WE WAN'T AN APOLOGY! Mother nature should apologize for this once and for all!
1. Picadilly Line should be shut down
2. We are constantly puttting up with pidgeons
cause.mission: get a national apology from mother nature.
cause.name: FSFL - Feel Sorry For Londers
